info.name: THE MASTERMIND V2.1
info.description: A theme designed to inspire your inner mastermind.
info.additionalInfo:
VERSION 2.1: Corrected font being reverted back to Arial rather than being Consolas.
VERSION 2.0: Attempted to make the theme automatically register for Tumblr.
VERSION 1.8: Stylized the background that appears when making new posts.
VERSION 1.7: Corrected data string preventing the use of certain site features.
VERSION 1.6: Corrected issue where hovering over the corner of a post caused a blue square to appear.
VERSION 1.5: Patched to work with Tumblr's updated coding. Set opacity of certain objects to 80%.
Credits:
